headline: Neil Peart, 67, Wizard of Rock Drumming Whose Lyrics Lifted Rush to a New Realm
abstract: His drumming was at once intricate and explosive, expanding Rush’s power-trio dynamics. His lyrics transformed the band’s songs into elaborate suites.
lead_paragraph: Neil Peart, the pyrotechnical drummer and high-concept lyricist for the Canadian progressive-rock trio Rush, died on Tuesday in Santa Monica, Calif. He was 67.
